  • music

Music

Shoreline Community College offers the most comprehensive Music Program among the state's community colleges. Offerings include small and large ensembles, guitar, percussion, piano, brass, woodwinds, choral, opera and musical theater, jazz studies, music theory and music history.

University Transfer Degrees

  • Classical piano (AM)
  • Classical voice (AM)
  • Instumental music (AM)
